posts.name: 6894 Lead prog/driver
posts.cooked: We are purchasing Orange Pi 5’s, but cant decide if we are going with 4gb or 8gb. There is no downside to getting more ram, but it is more money. is there any upside to having more RAM or does PV not even use that much more.

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: The docs write what hardware is recommended

posts.name: Carter Ryba
posts.cooked: With a title like this and the tag of photonvision I thought you were gonna have like 30 cameras and 7 coprocessors

posts.name: Jimmy McCosker
posts.cooked: I actually don’t think it would be that much strain on the battery to run that many cameras / co-processors?

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: If I remember correctly you are allowed to run a second buttery to power co-processors R602
